about.title: About Us
about.description: Contact Manager is a lightweight and secure web application for managing contact requests. Originally developed as a learning project with a focus on clean backend architecture, the app has evolved into a reusable template for small-scale forms with admin access.
about.techStack: This project was built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and EJS, emphasizing simplicity, transparency, and developer-friendliness.
about.openSource: Feel free to use or contribute – this project is open-source and built with ❤️ by developers who care about clean, maintainable code.
about.credits: Developed by Miłosz G. and ChatGPT as part of a practical learning and fullstack development journey.
